form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/21/202 7 DALMAR A 71 689 640 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS BRUCE HOUSE FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) February 3 1996 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at NAIROBI KENYA NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX (Mo. Day, Yr.) AHMED DALMAR ABDURAHMAN F M I certify that on the above date I examined 1906 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS B 2 CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid NOT INFECTIOUS Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Gonorrhea Tuberculosis, Not Active Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Inguinale Syphills, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease Mental Retardation or Disability: Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity CATARACT. RIGHT More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EYE EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm Mild fibrocalcific healed disease both apex Not Done and upper lobes is seen. DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DR. P. P. SHAH 20 JAN 96 DATE READ SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate treatment under Remarks) Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: VDRL TEST TYPE: HIV ANTIBODY SCREENING DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY THE NAIROBI HOSPITAL 2 FEB 96 THE NAIROBI HOSPITAL 2 FEB 96 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) Urine routine- Protein - nil, Glucose - nil DR. C. S. SHETH Stool routine- Negative DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS Branding scar - epigastrium. Dental staining +. CLASS B2 - Tuberculosis clinically NOT active, NOT infectious. X-ray Chest "Mild fibrocalcific healed disease both apex and upper lobes is seen". CLASS B - Loss of vision - right eye - Cataract. Advise ophthalmic evaluation, APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. x DolmonA -3 FEB 1996 Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE DR. C. S. SHETH 50157-103 4 12 FEB 96 NSN 7540-00-139-0058 OPTIONAL FORM 157 REVISED 2-88 GPO : 1993 o - 151-311 DEPT. OF STATE
